attributes.action: not call an early general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is important that with regards to the possible reforms to the House of COmmons/Lords regarding expenses - the changes need to be implemented to improve transparency before an election.

The UK also needs to be able to consider the action undertaken already with regards to the current financial situation, rather than calling an election, with a risk of leaving policy half implemented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
